data.title: Directions to Doncaster Prison
data.text:
HMP Doncaster,

Marshgate,

Doncaster,

South Yorkshire, DN5 8UX

The prison is located at Marshgate, near the centre of Doncaster and within walking distance of the train and bus stations.

Walking from the train or bus station

From Doncaster Train Station follow the signs for the Bus Interchange, which is connected to the Train Station

Walk through the Bus Interchange to the other end and cross the pedestrian crossing

A small lift will take you to the road above or you can walk under the road and use the steps to take you up onto the North Bridge

Cross the bridge and turn left following the signs to the prison

A taxi from the bus or train station will cost approximately Â£5.
